segments.text: What do you think of this suit ? Do I look good or what ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You look great ! However , I think you are a little over dressed for dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't they say we're going to the Ritz ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but not the Ritz Carlton , the " Ritz " is a pizza place with peanut shells on the floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In that case , let me make a quick change into my street clothes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll wait right here for you Superman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ta da ! Let's go to the Ritz !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can we go to the Carlton next time and can you wear that fabulous suit ?
segments.speaker: S2
